meanings.definition: A person who serves on the same ship as another.
meanings.sent1: My shipmate helped me hoist the sails.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy chatting with my shipmate during our breaks.
meanings.sent3: My shipmate and I always compete to see who can tie knots faster.
meanings.sent4: In the vast ocean, my shipmate is my anchor.
meanings.sent5: The bond between shipmates is unbreakable.

meanings.definition: A companion or friend on a ship.
meanings.sent1: Every evening, my shipmate and I watch the sunset together.
meanings.sent2: I trust my shipmate with all my secrets.
meanings.sent3: My shipmate and I often joke about who gets seasick first.
meanings.sent4: To me, my shipmate is like a lighthouse in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of my shipmate echoes through the ship.
